list.name: Changes
list.comment:
docs: delete architecture and integration documentation feat: enhance workout session management and UI polish
- Backend: Added granular exercise calculation methods to WorkoutCalculationService. - Backend: Implemented updateExerciseInWorkout and removeExerciseFromWorkout in WorkoutService to support session editing. - Backend: Fixed compilation errors in WorkoutMapper by linking to new calculation service methods. - Frontend: Refactored Edit Routine screen to match Hevy-inspired design with dark mode support. - Frontend: Fixed SafeAreaView deprecation warnings by migrating to react-native-safe-area-context. - Frontend: Implemented optimistic updates for renaming folders and removing plans to eliminate UI lag. Files: - docs/ARCHITECTURE.md - docs/BACKEND_API.md - docs/INTEGRATION.md - docs/SAVE_ROUTINE_FEATURE.md
Changes: - Document new PR badge feature architecture - Add timer controls API documentation - Update integration guide with new features - Document save routine feature workflow

task.summary: Default task

fix(config): update API base URL for Android emulator networking
- Change from 0.0.0.0:8080 to 10.0.2.2:8080 for Android emulator - Add dynamic IP selection based on platform - Support both development and production environments"

fix(api): handle ApiResponse wrapper and improve error handling
- Fix baseURL reference to use dynamic API_CONFIG.BASE_URL - Add enhanced request/response logging for debugging - Improve ApiResponse<T> wrapper handling - Add proper timeout and error handling

feat(auth): implement backend JWT authentication service
- Replace local storage auth with Spring Boot API integration - Add proper LoginResponse and User type handling - Implement JWT token storage and management - Add username-based login (replacing email validation) - Include comprehensive error handling and debugging

fix(auth): update login form to use username instead of email
- Change email field to username field with User icon - Remove email validation for username input - Add dev-only test credentials auto-fill - Improve error handling and user feedback

refactor(auth): replace local auth with backend API integration
- Remove AsyncStorage-based authentication system - Integrate with backend AuthService for login/register - Add proper User and LoginResponse state management - Handle JWT tokens and user sessions - Add backend response format compatibility

deps: update dependencies for backend authentication
- Update axios and related networking dependencies - Ensure compatibility with React Native and Expo - Lock dependency versions for stable authentication flow

feat: implement enriched routine folder API integration" -m "Add support for single-call routine folder endpoints that return complete workout plan details with exercises." -m "Changes: - Add enriched routine folder endpoints (public/{id}, personal) - Create WorkoutPlanCard component with Hevy-style exercise previews - Create PlannedExerciseCard for workout plan exercise display - Update RoutineService to normalize enriched API responses - Add proper type definitions for PlannedExercise and WorkoutPlan - Update routine detail screen to use embedded workout plan data - Fix type compatibility between Exercise and PlannedExercise

feat(home): add collapsible routine folders and workout cards
- Implement expandable/collapsible routine folder sections - Display all workout plans within each folder - Add professional icons replacing emojis - Add folder options menu with remove functionality - Include Start Workout button on workout plan cards - Support both card click (details) and button click (start)

feat(workouts): add workout plan detail screen
- Create Hevy-style workout plan detail view - Display workout stats (duration, exercises, sets) - Show exercise list with sets, reps, and rest timers - Add Start Routine button - Include share and edit options - Show username instead of user ID

feat(workouts): implement workout session tracking screen
- Create exercise-by-exercise workout flow - Add set logging with weight and reps inputs - Implement completion checkboxes for sets - Add rest timer modal - Include progress bar and navigation - Support warmup, normal, and failure set types

fix(services): handle multiple response formats in savePublicRoutine
- Support both wrapped and direct response formats - Add fallback mechanism for 404/405 errors - Improve error handling and logging - Maintain backward compatibility

feat(workouts): add workout plan detail screen with exercise breakdown
- Create Hevy-style workout plan detail view with stats - Display duration, exercise count, and total sets - Show complete exercise list with sets and rep ranges - Add Start Routine button with navigation to session - Include share and edit options in header - Display creator username instead of user ID - Add exercise cards with rest timers and notes - Support warmup sets and rep ranges display
feat(routines): add public routine detail screen
chore: update IDE workspace configuration
chore: update IDE workspace configuration

feat(workout-session): add rest timers, warmup controls, and cancel button
- Implement adjustable rest timer (1-5 min) with modal settings per exercise - Add warmup timer with play/pause/reset functionality - Add cancel workout button at bottom with confirmation - Fix workout duration to use local time and format with hours - Add rest timer countdown modal with +15/-15 second adjustments - Improve timer state management with separate refs for each timer type

feat(services): add personalRecords field to WorkoutSet type
- Add personalRecords?: string[] field to WorkoutSet interface - Enable PR type tracking for individual sets - Support backend PR detection response structure

feat(components): add PR badges and improved timer controls
- Display gold PR badge with Award icon on sets achieving personal records - Add rest timer settings button with modal - Implement warmup timer controls (play/pause/reset) - Show PR types (MAX_WEIGHT, MAX_REPS, etc.) on set rows - Improve timer display and active state indicators

feat(workout): add PR badges and timer controls to session screens
Files: - app/workout-session/[planId].tsx - app/workout-plan-detail/[planId].tsx - components/workout/SetRow.tsx
Changes: - Display gold PR badge with Award icon on sets achieving personal records - Add rest timer settings button with modal - Implement warmup timer controls (play/pause/reset) - Show PR types (MAX_WEIGHT, MAX_REPS, MAX_VOLUME) on set rows - Improve timer display and active state indicators

feat(workout-plans): enhance exercise management interfaces
Files: - app/workout-plans/[planId]/add-exercise.tsx - app/workout-session/add-exercise.tsx - app/workout-plans/create.tsx - app/workout-plans/[planId]/edit.tsx
Changes: - Improve exercise selection and configuration flow - Update add-exercise screens for both plans and sessions - Enhance workout plan creation and editing views - Add better exercise filtering and search

feat(services): update workout services with PR detection and timer features
Files: - services/WorkoutService.ts - services/WorkoutPlanService.ts - services/index.ts
Changes: - Integrate PR detection logic in workout service - Add timer control service methods - Update workout plan service with new features - Export new service methods

feat(types): add types for PR badges and timer controls
Files: - types/workout.types.ts - types/api.ts
Changes: - Add PersonalRecord types and interfaces - Define timer control types - Update workout session types - Add API response types for new features

docs: delete architecture and integration documentation
Files: - docs/ARCHITECTURE.md - docs/BACKEND_API.md - docs/INTEGRATION.md - docs/SAVE_ROUTINE_FEATURE.md
Changes: - Document new PR badge feature architecture - Add timer controls API documentation - Update integration guide with new features - Document save routine feature workflow

docs: delete architecture and integration documentation feat: enhance workout session management and UI polish
- Backend: Added granular exercise calculation methods to WorkoutCalculationService. - Backend: Implemented updateExerciseInWorkout and removeExerciseFromWorkout in WorkoutService to support session editing. - Backend: Fixed compilation errors in WorkoutMapper by linking to new calculation service methods. - Frontend: Refactored Edit Routine screen to match Hevy-inspired design with dark mode support. - Frontend: Fixed SafeAreaView deprecation warnings by migrating to react-native-safe-area-context. - Frontend: Implemented optimistic updates for renaming folders and removing plans to eliminate UI lag. Files: - docs/ARCHITECTURE.md - docs/BACKEND_API.md - docs/INTEGRATION.md - docs/SAVE_ROUTINE_FEATURE.md
Changes: - Document new PR badge feature architecture - Add timer controls API documentation - Update integration guide with new features - Document save routine feature workflow

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
docs: delete architecture and integration documentation feat: enhance workout session management and UI polish
- Backend: Added granular exercise calculation methods to WorkoutCalculationService. - Backend: Implemented updateExerciseInWorkout and removeExerciseFromWorkout in WorkoutService to support session editing. - Backend: Fixed compilation errors in WorkoutMapper by linking to new calculation service methods. - Frontend: Refactored Edit Routine screen to match Hevy-inspired design with dark mode support. - Frontend: Fixed SafeAreaView deprecation warnings by migrating to react-native-safe-area-context. - Frontend: Implemented optimistic updates for renaming folders and removing plans to eliminate UI lag. Files: - docs/ARCHITECTURE.md - docs/BACKEND_API.md - docs/INTEGRATION.md - docs/SAVE_ROUTINE_FEATURE.md
